titles: A short and plaine proofe by the word, and workes off God, that Gods decree is not the cause off anye mans sinne or condemnation And that all men are redeamed by Christ. As also. That no infants are condemned.
author: Helwys, Thomas, 1550?-1616?
notes: Place of publication suggested by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Free will and determinism --  Early works to 1800.
